text: Chappelle's Show is an American comedy television series starring comedian Dave Chappelle. The show was created by Chappelle and Neal Brennan. It aired from 2003â€“2006 on Comedy Central. The show ran for two complete seasons plus three "lost episodes". == Other websites == * Category:Comedy television series Category:2003 American television series debuts Category:2006 American television series endings Category:2000s American television series Category:English-language television programs
